Title: Orruk Mob
Intro: Each model in an Orruk Mob is armed with one of the following weapon options: Choppa and Waaagh! Shield; Pigstikka Spear and Waaagh! Shield; Pair of Choppas; Orruk Bow and Cutta. All models in the unit must be armed with the same weapon option.

Rules.Name: Shield
Rules.Rule: SHIELD: If this unit is armed with Waaagh! Shields, it has a Save characteristic of 4+ instead of 5+.

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be an Orruk Boss. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that modelâ€™s melee weapon.

Rules.Name: Standard Bearer
Rules.Rule: STANDARD BEARER: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be an Orruk Banner Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit if it includes any Orruk Banner Bearers.

Rules.Name: Musician
Rules.Rule: MUSICIAN: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Waaagh! Drummer. Add 1 to charge rolls for this unit if it includes any Waaagh! Drummers.

Rules.Name: Mob Rule
Rules.Rule: ABILITIES Add 1 to hit rolls for this unit if it has more than 5 models.
